Evaluating GANs

Although Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) are breaking the ground in daily basis, there is no gold-standard metric to measure how well the genertor works. We all know that several ML tasks’ standard metrics - such as mean square error (MSE) for linear regression and cross entropy for classification - but what about for GANs? How do we choo...
